oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rex Allen Jr. Live at the Lone Star Cafe - 1981-01-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Lonestar Cafe live show. The tape features a live performance of Rex Allen Jr. (musician). The Lonestar Caf� show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Rex Allen Jr. is from January 25, 1981.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rex Allen Jr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Mike Fitzgerald introduces Rex Allen Jr. -- (00:30) Truck Drivin' Man (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (03:48) San Antonio Rose (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (07:06) It's Over (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (09:49) This Bud's For You (D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles) -- (10:53) It's Been Rough and Rocky Travelin' (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (14:52) No, No, No I'd Rather be Free (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (18:25) Loving Arms (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (21:03) Unidentified tune [featuring Anheuser /Busch commercial spot voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (22:02) Lee commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host) -- (22:29) Fitzgerald reintroduces Allen Jr. -- (23:41) Goodbye (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (27:29) This Bud's For You (D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles) -- (28:27) Porcelana commercial spot hosted by a pair of unidentified hosts -- (29:27) Fitzgerald reintroduces Allen Jr. -- (29:42) Two Less Lonely People in the World (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (32:32) Lonely Street (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (34:27) Fitzgerald introduces the commercial break -- (34:36) This Bud's For You (D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles) -- (35:36) Lee commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (36:01) Fitzgerald reintroduces Allen Jr. -- (36:18) Prairie Moon (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (38:26) You're Gonna be a Star (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (41:25) Oklahoma Rose (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (45:12) Lee commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (45:41) This Bud's For You (D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles) -- (46:39) Fitzgerald reintroduces Allen Jr. -- (46:51) There's a Blue Sky Way Out Yonder (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (49:09) Tumbling Tumbleweeds (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (51:47) Cool Water (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (53:14) Fitzgerald introduces the commercial break -- (53:20) This Bud's For You (D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles) -- (54:18) Lee commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (54:45) Fitzgerald reintroduces Allen Jr. -- (54:47) Broken Lady (Rex Allen Jr.) -- (57:14) Unidentified tune [featuring Mike Fitzgerald voiceover] ([Unidentified])
